text: Xɛɛ bɔxɔne sarama nɛn gbetin na, e sara kɛdine yi yɛlan, muxune yi e taxamasenne sa e ma sereyane yɛɛ xɔri Bunyamin yamanani e nun Yerusalɛn rabilinna taane nun Yuda taane nun geya yire taane nun sogegododen binna geya yire taane nun Negewi yamanan taane yi. Bayo, Alatala mɔn e yamanan nasabatima nɛn. Alatalaa falan nan na ra.”
